sentences.en: a primitive nomadic tribe
sentences.cn: 原始的游牧部落

sentences.en: a primitive society
sentences.cn: 原始社会

sentences.en: Conditions at the camp are very primitive.
sentences.cn: 营地条件非常简陋。

sentences.en: Duffy's primitive guitar playing is well below par.
sentences.cn: 达菲粗糙的吉他演奏技巧远不够水平。

sentences.en: He made a primitive boat out of some pieces of wood.
sentences.cn: 他用几块木头做了艘简易的小船.

sentences.en: He was an Italian primitive.
sentences.cn: 他是一位意大利早期的艺术家.

sentences.en: It's using some rather primitive technology.
sentences.cn: 它使用的是非常古老的技术。

sentences.en: primitive art
sentences.cn: 原始艺术

sentences.en: Primitive humans needed to be able to react like this to escape from dangerous animals.
sentences.cn: 原始人必须要能作出这样的反应以逃避危险的动物。

sentences.en: Primitive man made himself primitive tools from stones and bones.
sentences.cn: 原始人用石块和骨头做原始的工具.

sentences.en: Primitive man quickly learned how to manipulate tools.
sentences.cn: 原始人很快就学会了使用工具.

sentences.en: Primitive tribes lived by fishing, hunting and gathering.
sentences.cn: 原始部落靠渔猎采集为生.

sentences.en: The carol has a primitive strength and haunting simplicity.
sentences.cn: 这首颂歌有一种原始的力量和令人难忘的纯朴.

sentences.en: The conditions are primitive by any standards.
sentences.cn: 无论用什么标准来衡量，其条件都很简陋。

sentences.en: The Eskimos of the far north are primitive.
sentences.cn: 遥远北方的爱斯基摩人是原始人.

sentences.en: The first station buildings were quite primitive.
sentences.cn: 最初的车站建筑很简陋。

sentences.en: The local hospital care is primitive and unreliable.
sentences.cn: 当地医院的治疗水平落后，靠不住。

sentences.en: The methods of communication used during the war were primitive by today's standards.
sentences.cn: 按今天的标准，大战时期使用的通讯方法非常简陋。

sentences.en: The paradox is that the region's most dynamic economies have the most primitive financial systems.
sentences.cn: 矛盾之处在于这个地区最有活力的经济体却有着最落后的金融体系。

sentences.en: The primitive surgery of those days left him virtually deaf in one ear.
sentences.cn: 那时候简陋的外科手术让他一只耳朵几乎失聪。

sentences.en: the tools used by primitive man
sentences.cn: 原始人所用的工具

sentences.en: The tribe's development was more primitive than that of their neighbours.
sentences.cn: 那个部落处于比邻近部落更原始的发展阶段.

words.tran_cn: 初级读本；识字课本；原始物
原始主义；尚古主义；原始的风格

trans.tran_cn: 原始的，发展水平低的，落后的，[生物学]原生的
trans.tran_en: belonging to a simple way of life that existed in the past and does not have modern industries and machines

trans.tran_cn: 原始人，早期的艺术家（作品），单纯的人：不世故的人，自学的艺术家
trans.tran_en: an artist who paints simple pictures like those of a child
